## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3445cee4e2fd4e4e0170f04b51b2a3409af7c1b2478609a38bcc46d5094e134d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pylint-py' @ 15.0.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
